meanings.definition: A thing that happens or takes place, especially one of importance.
meanings.sent1: The school play was one of the most exciting events of the year.
meanings.sent2: The wedding was a beautiful event that brought everyone together.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocking over the vase was quite the unexpected event.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm was an event of epic proportions, shaking the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party was an event that will be remembered for years to come.

meanings.definition: A planned public or social occasion.
meanings.sent1: The carnival was a fun-filled events for families to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The charity event raised a lot of money for a good cause.
meanings.sent3: The costume party was an event full of laughter and creativity.
meanings.sent4: The music festival was an event that brought people from all over the country.
meanings.sent5: The parade was an event that filled the streets with joy and excitement.

meanings.sent1: The car accident was a tragic event that changed many lives.
meanings.sent2: The argument between friends was a regrettable event that led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stealing the picnic food was a comical event that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The power outage was an event that plunged the neighborhood into darkness.
meanings.sent5: The winning goal in the soccer match was an event that made the crowd erupt in cheers.
